001package org.consensusj.exchange.knowm;
002
003import org.consensusj.exchange.CurrencyUnitPair;
004import org.consensusj.exchange.ExchangeRateChange;
005import org.consensusj.exchange.ExchangeRateObserver;
006import org.consensusj.exchange.rx.ExchangeRateUpdate;
007import org.javamoney.moneta.convert.ExchangeRateBuilder;
008import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.DefaultNumberValue;
009import org.javamoney.moneta.spi.LazyBoundCurrencyConversion;
010import org.knowm.xchange.Exchange;
011import org.knowm.xchange.ExchangeFactory;
012import org.knowm.xchange.currency.CurrencyPair;
013import org.knowm.xchange.dto.marketdata.Ticker;
014import org.knowm.xchange.service.marketdata.MarketDataService;
015
016import javax.money.CurrencyUnit;
017import javax.money.MonetaryException;
018import javax.money.convert.ConversionContext;
019import javax.money.convert.ConversionQuery;
020import javax.money.convert.CurrencyConversion;
021import javax.money.convert.CurrencyConversionException;
022import javax.money.convert.ExchangeRate;
023import javax.money.convert.ExchangeRateProvider;
024import javax.money.convert.ProviderContext;
025import javax.money.convert.RateType;
026import java.io.IOException;
027import java.util.ArrayList;
028import java.util.Collection;
029import java.util.Date;
030import java.util.HashMap;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch;
034import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
035import java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException;
036
037/**
038 *
039 */
040public class KnowmExchangeRateProvider implements ExchangeRateProvider {
041    protected final String exchangeClassName;
042    protected final Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions;
043    protected final Map<CurrencyUnitPair, MonitoredCurrency> monitoredCurrencies = new HashMap<>();
044
045    protected String name;
046    protected ProviderContext providerContext;
047    protected MarketDataService marketDataService;
048
049    private volatile boolean initialized = false;
050    protected Exchange exchange;
051
052    /**
053     * Construct using an XChange Exchange class object for a set of currencies
054     * @param exchangeClassName Classname of XChange exchange we are wrapping
055     * @param pairs pairs to monitor
056     */
057    protected KnowmExchangeRateProvider(String exchangeClassName,
058                                              Map<CurrencyUnit, String> tickerSymbolConversions,
059                                              Collection<CurrencyUnitPair> pairs) {
060        this.exchangeClassName = exchangeClassName;
061        this.tickerSymbolConversions = (tickerSymbolConversions != null) ? tickerSymbolConversions : new HashMap<>();
062        for (CurrencyUnitPair pair : pairs) {
063            KnowmExchangeRateProvider.MonitoredCurrency monitoredCurrency = new KnowmExchangeRateProvider.MonitoredCurrency(pair, xchangePair(pair));
064            monitoredCurrencies.put(pair, monitoredCurrency);
065        }
066    }
067
068
069    public synchronized void initialize()  {
070        if (!initialized) {
071            initialized = true;
072            exchange = ExchangeFactory.INSTANCE.createExchange(exchangeClassName);
073            name = exchange.getExchangeSpecification().getExchangeName();
074            providerContext = ProviderContext.of(name, RateType.DEFERRED);
075            marketDataService = exchange.getMarketDataService();
076        }
077    }
078
079    public ExchangeRateUpdate getUpdate(CurrencyUnitPair pair) {
080        MonitoredCurrency pairMonitor = monitoredCurrencies.get(pair);
081        Ticker ticker;
082        try {
083            ticker = marketDataService.getTicker(pairMonitor.exchangePair);
084        } catch (IOException e) {
085            e.printStackTrace();
086            ticker = null;
087        }
088        return tickerToUpdate(pair, ticker);
089    }
090
091    private ExchangeRateUpdate tickerToUpdate(CurrencyUnitPair pair, Ticker ticker) {
092        return (ticker != null) ?
093                new ExchangeRateUpdate(pair, DefaultNumberValue.of(ticker.getBid()), ticker.getTimestamp().getTime()) :
094                new ExchangeRateUpdate(pair, null, 0);
095    }
096
097    @Override
098    public ProviderContext getContext() {
099        return providerContext;
100    }
101
102    @Override
103    public boolean isAvailable(ConversionQuery conversionQuery) {
104        return getExchangeRate(conversionQuery) != null;
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    public ExchangeRate getExchangeRate(ConversionQuery conversionQuery) {
109        CurrencyUnitPair pair = new CurrencyUnitPair(conversionQuery.getBaseCurrency(), conversionQuery.getCurrency());
110        KnowmExchangeRateProvider.MonitoredCurrency monitoredCurrency = monitoredCurrencies.get(pair);
111        if (monitoredCurrency == null) {
112            throw new CurrencyConversionException(pair.getBase(),
113                    pair.getTarget(),
114                    null,
115                    "Pair not found.");
116        }
117        ExchangeRate rate = null;
118        try {
119            rate = buildExchangeRate(pair, monitoredCurrency.getTicker());
120        } catch (TimeoutException e) {
121            throw new MonetaryException("Timeout loading exchange rate", e);
122        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
123            Thread.currentThread().interrupt(); // Restore interruption flag
124        }
125        return rate;
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    public CurrencyConversion getCurrencyConversion(ConversionQuery conversionQuery) {
130        return new LazyBoundCurrencyConversion(conversionQuery, this, ConversionContext
131                .of(getContext().getProviderName(), getContext().getRateTypes().iterator().next()));
132    }
133
134    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
135    protected ExchangeRateChange buildExchangeRateChange(CurrencyUnitPair pair, Ticker ticker) {
136        Date date = ticker.getTimestamp();
137        // Not all exchanges provide a timestamp, default to 0 if it is null
138        long milliseconds = (date != null) ? date.getTime() : 0;
139
140        return new ExchangeRateChange(buildExchangeRate(pair, ticker), milliseconds);
141    }
142
143    private ExchangeRate buildExchangeRate(CurrencyUnitPair pair, Ticker ticker) {
144        return new ExchangeRateBuilder(name, RateType.DEFERRED)
145                .setBase(pair.getBase())
146                .setTerm(pair.getTarget())
147                .setFactor(DefaultNumberValue.of(ticker.getLast()))
148                .build();
149    }
150
151    /**
152     * Map from CurrencyUnitPair to XChange CurrencyPair
153     * tickerSymbolConversions is used to handle cases like ItBit that uses "XBT" instead of "BTC"
154     * @param pair  CurrencyUnitPair using JavaMoney CurrencyUnits
155     * @return  XChange CurrencyPair with exchange-specific symbols if any
156     */
157    protected CurrencyPair xchangePair(CurrencyUnitPair pair) {
158        return new CurrencyPair(convertSymbol(pair.getBase()),
159                convertSymbol(pair.getTarget()));
160    }
161
162    /**
163     * Convert a JavaMoney CurrencyUnit to an XChange currency code string
164     * (This will be exchange-specific (e.g. ItBit uses "XBT" instead of "BTC")
165     * @param currencyUnit A JavaMoney currency unit
166     * @return exchange-specific symbol for the currency
167     */
168    public String convertSymbol(CurrencyUnit currencyUnit) {
169        return tickerSymbolConversions.getOrDefault(currencyUnit, currencyUnit.getCurrencyCode());
170    }
171
172    protected static class MonitoredCurrency {
173        final public CurrencyUnitPair  pair;           // Terminating (target) JavaMoney CurrencyUnit
174        final public CurrencyPair      exchangePair;   // XChange currency pair (format used by XChange/exchange)
175        @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
176        final public List<ExchangeRateObserver> observerList = new ArrayList<>();
177        private final UpdateableValueLatch<Ticker> tickerLatch = new UpdateableValueLatch<>();
178
179        MonitoredCurrency(CurrencyUnitPair pair, CurrencyPair exchangePair) {
180            this.pair = pair;
181            this.exchangePair = exchangePair;
182        }
183
184        public boolean isTickerAvailable() {
185            return tickerLatch.isSet();
186        }
187
188        /**
189         * Get Ticker from the UpdateableValueLatch
190         * @return ticker object
191         * @throws InterruptedException thread was interrupted by another thread
192         * @throws TimeoutException should only happen if first request times out
193         */
194        public Ticker getTicker() throws InterruptedException, TimeoutException {
195            return tickerLatch.getValue();
196        }
197
198        /**
199         * Set the ticker object, called from polling method
200         * @param ticker ticker object
201         */
202        public void setTicker(Ticker ticker) {
203            tickerLatch.setValue(ticker);
204        }
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * A value latch that will block if value not yet set, but allows
209     * the value to be updated regularly (e.g. when polling for new values)
210     * @param <T>  Type of value to latch
211     */
212    static class UpdateableValueLatch<T> {
213        private volatile T value = null;
214        private final CountDownLatch ready = new CountDownLatch(1);
215        private final long timeoutSeconds;
216
217        UpdateableValueLatch() {
218            this(120);
219        }
220
221        UpdateableValueLatch(long timeoutInSeconds) {
222            this.timeoutSeconds = timeoutInSeconds;
223        }
224
225        T getValue() throws InterruptedException, TimeoutException {
226            // were we called before first poll completed?
227            if (value == null) {
228                // wait for the CountDownLatch
229                boolean loaded = ready.await(timeoutSeconds, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
230                if (!loaded) {
231                    throw new TimeoutException("Timeout before value set");
232                }
233            }
234            return value;
235        }
236
237        /* synchronized ? */ void setValue(T newValue) {
238            value = newValue;
239            ready.countDown();
240        }
241
242        boolean isSet() {
243            return value != null;
244        }
245    }
246}
